ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We acknowledge the World Climate Research Programme’s Working Group on Coupled Modelling, which is responsible for CMIP, and we thank the climate modeling groups (listed in Supplementary Table 1 of this paper) for producing and making available their model output. Calculations were performed using HPC resources from DNUM CCUB (Centre de Calcul de l’Université de Bourgogne). This work is part of the ANR project VIP-Mont Blanc (grant ANR-14-CE03-0006-04).
